Name: Sergeant Serpentine
Description: Once the centerpiece of an underground arcade, Sergeant Serpentine has seen numerous battles, with his screen showing the endless loops of a snake game that he mastered beyond any human competitor. After the arcade's closure, he donned a pair of sturdy combat boots and utility belt buttons, deciding to march out into the world. His glasses are not just a fashion statement; they represent his vision to see the potential in every challenge. Now, he's a valued member of the WebtrES club, always ready to lead his digital comrades through the virtual battlefield with strategic precision and pixelated pride.
